text: La sombra del pasado is a Mexican telenovela. It is produced by Televisa. Production started on August 18, 2014. == Cast == Actor Character Michelle Renaud Aldonza Alcocer Lozada (Protagonist) Pablo Lyle Cristóbal Mendoza Rivera (Protagonist) Alexis Ayala Severiano Mendoza (Main Villain) Thelma Madrigal Barbara (Main Villain) Alejandra Barros Candela Rivera de Mendoza (Villain) Alfredo Adame Padre Jerónimo Alcocer Susana González Roberta Lozada Torres de Alcocer Cynthia Klitbo Prudencia Mendoza de Zapata (Villain) Manuel "Flaco" Ibáñez Melesio == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2014 Mexican television series debuts Category:Telenovelas by Televisa
title: La sombra del pasado
